content: ghosty boo pattern boo pattern materials materials 5 5mm hook bulky 6 weight yarn i used sweet snuggles light yarn needle polyfil scissors safety eyes abbreviations abbreviations single_crochet - single_crochet increase - increase decrease - decrease st - stitch flo - front loop only magic_ring - magic_ring pattern pattern 1 single_crochet 6 in magic_ring 6 2 single_crochet increase each st around 12 3 *single_crochet increase* around 18 4-5 single_crochet each st around 18 **insert eyes btw row 4 and 5 approx 3 sts apart** 6 single_crochet 5 bobble single_crochet 8 bobble single_crochet 3 18 7 single_crochet each st around 18 8 single_crochet increase flo each st around 36 9 in back loops of round 7 *single_crochet decrease* around 12 **stuff your ghosty** 10 decrease around 6 fasten_off and leave tail for sewing finish stuffing and sew closed
